item.title: SQL Injection Lab – Lesson 6 (Second Order Injections)
item.description: Second‑Order Injection Second ‑ Order SQL injection is similar to stored cross‑site scripting: the attacker injects malicious payload into the database, and the payload is later used in a different query on another page, causing the injection at a later time. Lab Walkthrough Database before creating user. User Registration & Login Flow Sign‑up: Enter a username and password (e.g., 1234 / p@ssw0rd) in my case I’m using r00tpunk as Username and blah as Password.
